welcome_subtitle: Choose your path to master the world of Minecraft.
blocks_desc: Drag, drop, and build logic like LEGO.
blocks_intro: Visual blocks are the best way to start. You use the 'MakeCode' editor to connect logic pieces.
blocks_lesson1_desc: In Minecraft, an event is something that happens, like a player jumping or a block being broken. We use these to start our code.
python_intro: Python is a powerful language used by professionals. In Minecraft, it's perfect for complex building and data manipulation.
python_lesson1_desc: Your Agent is a small robot that can build for you. Using a 'for' loop, you can tell him to repeat tasks automatically.
js_intro: JavaScript (and TypeScript) is the engine behind Minecraft: Education Edition's advanced features.
js_lesson1_desc: Everything in Minecraft happens at a coordinate: X (West/East), Y (Up/Down), and Z (North/South).
